title: Route 670 Service Alert
message: Route 670 is experiencing delays due to construction work on Ctra M608. Expect 10-15 minute delays during peak hours (7-9 AM, 5-7 PM).

title: Weekend Service Changes
message: This weekend (Jan 20-21), some routes will operate on reduced schedules. Check individual route schedules for details.

title: Schedule System Maintenance
message: The schedule viewer will be updated tonight (Jan 15) from 11 PM to 1 AM. Real-time data may be temporarily unavailable.

title: Route 671 Temporary Suspension
message: Route 671 (Madrid Moncloa - Moralzarzal) is temporarily suspended due to road closure. Use Route 670 as alternative.
